Headline: #47 47th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 47th/Hoyne
ShortDescription: Eastbound 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Western, 51st, Ashland and 47th, over normal route, due to street blockage near 47th/Hoyne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Western, 51st, Ashland and 47th, over normal route, due to street blockage near 47th/Hoyne.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed near LaSalle
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing near LaSalle due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing near LaSalle due to a mechanical problem on a train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
